descriptionHtml:
Check the user submited images for more details of the armor.
This is my armor concept that i made long ago but never really finished it (im just so lazy, what can i do) so i decided to upload it as it is. Maybe one day ill finish it and also make the female version.


The eyes and skulls glow red (you cant see it in the pictures but it works ingame, look at the user submited images).
You can get this armor through console commands.

Future plans:
-make a better glow map
-fix the meshes and textures
-make a female version - there is a female version, but it's just saviors hide w/ glowing eyes
-make a smithing and tempering recipe
-Maybe a little quest line...

Well, there is a lot to do...

I would be very happy if you would upload some images of this armor.

[b]Check my other mods[/b]
-"1-handed" series
